text: Hello everyone, anyone know if custom properties is supported on products? If so, where do I set it?
When you go to settings, there is an item Properties in the sidebar. But you can only add properties to contact, deal, company and ticket.
Ah! so not on products, got it, thanks! :slightly_smiling_face:
You can add properties to products via the API, itâ€™s just not supported in the UI yet

Is there a way to create a performance report for a particular workflow? Banging my head from a few hours but didn't have any luck as the community has flooded with these type of questions. Can anyone please help?
I think this needs a deeper explaination

Hi. I don't really know if there's a specific channel for this so I am going to ask here. I contacted support but so far they can only help me manually upload the xml but the same issues persist. Is it possible to get a HubSpotter looking into this deeper with me?
